metadata.title: CVE-2023-30798 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: There MultipartParser usage in Encode's Starlette python framework beforeversions 0.25.0 allows an unauthenticated and remote attacker to specifyany number of form fields or files which can cause excessive memory usageresulting in denial of service of the HTTP service.

criterions.comment: starlette package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
